mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_WRITER, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_WDATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_WRITER = #{value} AND PRODUCT_INFO='팝니다' ORDER BY PRODUCT_WDATE

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_WRITER, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_WDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, p.* FROM (SELECT * FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_WRITER = #{memberName} AND PRODUCT_INFO='팝니다' ORDER BY PRODUCT_WDATE DESC) p) WHERE NUM BETWEEN (1+(#{page}-1)*10) AND (#{page}*10)

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_WRITER, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_WDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, p.* FROM (SELECT * FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_WRITER = #{memberName} AND PRODUCT_INFO='팝니다' AND (PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%' OR PRODUCT_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%' OR PRODUCT_STATE LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%') ORDER BY PRODUCT_WDATE DESC) p) WHERE NUM BETWEEN (1+(#{page}-1)*10) AND (#{page}*10)

SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_TITLE, PRODUCT_WRITER, PRODUCT_STATE, PRODUCT_WDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, p.* FROM (SELECT * FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_WRITER = #{memberName} AND PRODUCT_INFO='팝니다' AND (PRODUCT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%' OR PRODUCT_CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%' OR PRODUCT_STATE LIKE '%' || #{productSearch} || '%') ORDER BY PRODUCT_WDATE DESC) p)

SELECT H.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, P.PRODUCT_INFO, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, P.PRODUCT_WRITER, P.PRODUCT_STATE, P.PRODUCT_WDATE FROM HEART H JOIN PRODUCT P ON H.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE H.MEMBER_ID = #{value} ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID
